mediawiki/default_skin.description: Default skin: you can change the default skin. Use the internal symbolic names, ie 'standard', 'nostalgia', 'cologneblue', 'monobook', 'vector'

mediawiki/rights_page.description: Set to the title of a wiki page that describes your license/copyright

mediawiki/download_logo_url.description: URL from which to download your custom MediaWiki logo

mediawiki/db_user_account.description: Database non-root account used for normal operations

mediawiki/dns_name.description: DNS name of the MediaWiki site

mediawiki/script_path.description: The URL base path to the directory containing the wiki defaults for all runtime URL paths are based off of this.  This must be a full URL including protocol (e.g. http://mywikiserver.com).

mediawiki/image_magick_path.description: Path to the Image Magick convert executable

mediawiki/image_magick.description: Enable or disable use of Image Magick to create thumbnails

mediawiki/db_root_password.description: Password for the MediaWiki database root account

mediawiki/style_path.description: The path to the skins directory, relative to script_path (e.g. skins/)

mediawiki/db_user_password.description: Password for database non-root account used for normal operations

mediawiki/max_query_length.description: Query string length limit for ResourceLoader. You should only set this if your web server has a query string length limit (then set it to that limit), or if you have suhosin.get.max_value_length set in php.ini (then set it to that value)

mediawiki/download_favicon.description: URL from which to download your custom favorites icon

mediawiki/rights_icon.description: Path to the MediaWiki rights icon

mediawiki/instant_commons.description: InstantCommons allows wiki to use images from http://commons.wikimedia.org

mediawiki/db_server_address.description: MediaWiki database server name or IP address

mediawiki/installation_directory.description: Path to directory where MediaWiki will be installed

mediawiki/mediawiki_admin_password.description: Password for the MediaWiki admin account

mediawiki/logo_path.description: Path to your MediaWiki site logo, relative to style_path (e.g. common/images/custom.png)

mediawiki/download_localsettings.description: If you intend to install an existing MediaWiki database, supply a URL to download the LocalSettings.php that was generated with that database.  It will be used to populate the new LocalSettings.php.

mediawiki/file_uploads.description: To enable image uploads, make sure the 'images' directory is writable, then set this to true:

mediawiki/db_root_account.description: Root account name for the MediaWiki database

mediawiki/mw_version.description: Select the version of MediaWiki that you want to install

mediawiki/diff3_path.description: Path to the GNU diff3 utility. Used for conflict resolution.

mediawiki/admin_email.description: E-mail address of the MediaWiki site administrator

long_description:
= MediaWiki RightScale Components

== DESCRIPTION:

This cookbook provides a set of chef recipies that you can use to install,
configure, and maintain MediaWiki on RightScale.

The recipes in this cookbook are not tied to a particular ServerTemplate,
but can be used in various combinations with other RightScale chef recipes.

== USE:

Add mediawiki_install to the boot scripts for your ServerTemplate and set
the MEDIAWIKI inputs.  Add mediawiki_first_time_config and
mediawiki_update_settings to the operational scripts for your ServerTemplate.
Also add any mediawiki_extension recipes that you wish to use to the
operational scripts.

If you already have a MediaWiki database, install it on the server, either
manually, or by using RightScale database manager recipes such as
db::do_primary_restore, db::do_secondary_restore, or db::do_dump_import.
This script installs MediaWiki and creates a LocalSettings.php file, but
does not configure the database.

If you need to configure a new MediaWiki database, run the
mediawiki_first_time_config operational script.  This script configures
a new MediaWiki database and updates the LocalSettings.php file as 
necessary.

== REQUIREMENTS:

This recipe installs only MediaWiki.  You must satisfy the normal 
dependencies for MediaWiki by adding recipes to your ServerTemplate that
install a database, PHP, and a web server.  The RightScale LAMP 
ServerTemplate is a good base on which to add MediaWiki.

* The RepoPath for the ServerTemplate that uses these recipes must include 
the rightscale_cookbooks repository.

== COOKBOOKS DEPENDENCIES:

Please see the <tt>metadata.rb</tt> file for the current dependencies.

== KNOWN LIMITATIONS:

This recipe does not perform first-time configuration of the MediaWiki
database.

Please see the <tt>metadata.rb</tt> file for the current list of supported
operating systems.

== SETUP:

* Place the <tt>cloudoptimizer::install_mediawiki</tt> recipe into your 
  runlist to install and set up MediaWiki.

= LICENSE:

Chef recipes copyright Bill Whitson 2012. All rights reserved.

recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_simplesur: Install and configure the SimpleSurvey extension
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_recentpag: Install and configure the RecentPages extension
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_first_time_config: Configure MediaWiki with a new database
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_nuke: Install and configure the Nuke extension
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_dynamicpa: Install and configure the Dynamic Page List (third party) extension
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_contactpa: Install and configure the ContactPage extension
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_articlefe: Install and configure the ArticleFeedback extension
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_update_settings: Update MediaWiki settings after first time configuration
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_prefswitc: Install and configure the PrefSwitch extension
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_googleana: Install and configure the googleAnalytics extension
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_clicktrac: Install and configure the ClickTracking extension
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_renameuse: Install and configure the RenameUser extension
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_parserfun: Install and configure the ParserFunctions extension
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_confirmed: Install and configure the ConfirmEdit extension
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_emailcapt: Install and configure the EmailCapture extension
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_categoryt: Install and configure the CategoryTree extension
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_addthis: Install and configure the AddThis extension
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_openid: Install and configure the OpenID extension
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_liquidthr: Install and configure the LiquidThreads extension
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_gadgets: Install and configure the Gadgets extension
recipes.mediawiki::mediawiki_extension_collectio: Install and configure the Collection extension

name: mediawiki
